This game is still at its finest no matter how long has it been since release, but I would like to recommend adding a steam workshop onto this game. Yes there are sites like gamebanana where you can download custom skins and all, but I really do recommend adding Steam workshop just like Tf2.

Really good game, they put a lot of effort into it. Some people hate it but i dont. I love that it is mod friendly vs csgo. The deagle is better, and so is the awp. Except it can be extremely difficult to get collaterals. Be sure to use some sound mods if you dont want "FIRE IN THE HOLE" screaming in your ear 24/7.
